hadiths.text: It was narrated from Jubair bin Mutim that the Prophet said:"O Banu Abd Manaf, do not prevent anyone from circumambulating this House of praying at any time of the night or day he wishes

chapter.ara-name: باب إِبَاحَةِ الطَّوَافِ فِي كُلِّ الأَوْقَاتِ
chapter.eng-name: Tawaf Is Permissible At All Times
